ComicInfo.Summary: A special one-shot issue paying homage to the late Dwayne McDuffie and the world of Milestone Media. Written by Felicia Henderson with tribute material from Milestone co-founder Denys Cowan and other Milestone alumni, this issue re-establishes Static's place in the DCU.
ComicInfo.Title: Super 8 Story; I am the Future
